testsuite.name: Verify login function
testsuite.details: Testing module login: rejestration, loging, update data and delete

testcase.name: Registration user
testcase.summary: New user registration
testcase.preconditions:
1. User has a valid email
  2. User name is free

step.actions: In the ’user’ field, enter the user name
In the 'email' field, enter the user email

step.expectedresults: Opening the page with 'Link sent to [registration e-mail] to activate the account'

testcase.name: Registration user (wrong password)
testcase.summary: Registration user with wrong passwod

step.actions: In the ’user’ field, enter the user name
In the ’password’ field, enter the password with 5 characters

testcase.name: Registration user (existing data)
testcase.summary: User registration with existing user name and email
testcase.preconditions:
1. User email is not free
  2. Email is used to registration

step.actions: In the ’user’ field, enter the user name
In the ’email’ field, enter the email, which used to registration

testcase.name: Login by user name
testcase.summary: Logging in using the user name used for registration.

step.actions:
In the ’user or email ’field, enter the user name

step.expectedresults: user is log, open the home page

testcase.name: Login by email
testcase.summary: Logging be email, used for registration

step.actions: In the ’user or email’ field, enter the mail

step.expectedresults: user is log, open the home page

testcase.name: Login without account
testcase.summary: Logging to site without account
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has not account
  2. password has min. 6 characters
  3. email is correct pattern

step.actions: In the ’user or email’ field, enter random characters
In the ’password’ field, enter random characters min. 6

step.expectedresults: reopen logging site, message 'invalid login or password'

testcase.name: Login with wrong user name
testcase.summary: Logging with wrong user name

step.actions: In the ’user or email’ field, enter wrong user name

step.expectedresults: reopening the login page, the message 'incorrect login or password'

testcase.name: Login with wrong password
testcase.summary: Logging with wrong password

step.actions: In the ’use or emailr’ field, enter the correct data
In the ’password’ field, enter the wrong password

step.expectedresults: reopening the login page, the message 'incorrect login or password'

testcase.name: Forgotten password
testcase.summary: Procedure for created a new password

step.actions: filled in the 'Your e-mail address' field with the e-mail address assigned to the user account

step.expectedresults: open page to create a new password

step.actions: In the ’new password’ field, enter the password
In the ’user’ and 'password field, enter the user name nad new password

testcase.name: Login with wrong email
testcase.summary: Logging with wrong email

step.actions: In the ’user or email’ field, enter the wrong email

step.expectedresults: reopening the login page, the message 'incorrect login or password'

testcase.name: Regestration with Facebook
testcase.summary: Regestration with Facebook account

step.actions: In the ’email / phone number’ field, enter the correct data
In the ’password’ field, enter the facebook password

testcase.name: Login by Facebook
testcase.summary: Logging by Facebook account
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has facebook account
  2. wykop.pl account link with facebook account

step.actions: In the ’user / phone number’ field, enter the correct FB data
In the ’password’ field, enter the correct FB data

testcase.name: Change password
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different

step.actions: In the ’old password’ field, enter the present password
In the ’new password’ field, enter the new password with correct patern
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the same characters - 'new password'

testcase.name: Change password (invalid)
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different using invalid present password

step.actions: In the ’old password’ field, enter the random characters
In the ’new password’ field, enter the new password
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the same characters - 'new password

step.expectedresults: password not changed, message 'the password is incorrect'

testcase.name: Change password (different password)
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different using two different password

step.actions: In the ’old password’ field, enter the present password
In the ’new password’ field, enter the new password
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the different characters than 'new password'

step.expectedresults: password do not change, message 'the passwords is different'

testcase.name: Change password (too small characters)
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different, using 5 characters

step.actions:
wypełnić pole "stare hasło" poprawnymi danymi

In the ’old password’ field, enter the present password
In the ’new password’ field, enter the 5 random characters
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the same characters - 'new password'

testcase.name: Login with new password
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website with new password, changed password.

step.actions: In the ’user name or email’ field, enter the correct data
In the ’password’ field, enter the new changed password

step.expectedresults: user logged in, open the home page

testcase.name: Login with the old password
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website using a old password

step.actions: In the ’user name or email’ field, enter the correct data
In the ’passwordr’ field, enter the old password

testcase.name: Change email (wrong password)
testcase.summary: Changing email with linked account the website, used wrong password
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has a active new email

step.actions: In the ’new email’ field, enter the new active email
In the 'repeat new email' field, enter the same characters - 'new email'
In the ’password account’ field, enter the wron password

testcase.name: Change email
testcase.summary: Changing email with linked account the website
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has a active new email

step.actions: In the ’new email’ field, enter the new active account
In the 'repeat new email' field, enter the same characters - 'new email'
in the 'password account' field, enter the present password

step.expectedresults: message about a sending active link to a new email
redirection to the website wykop.pl, changed e-mail

testcase.name: Change email (different emails)
testcase.summary: Changing email with linked account the website use different email
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has a new active email

step.actions: in the 'new email' field, enter the new email
In the 'repeat new email' field, enter the random characters - 'new email'
in the 'password account' field, enter the present password

testcase.name: Login with new email
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website using a new, changed email

step.actions: in the 'user name or email' field, enter the new changed email

testcase.name: Login with old mail
testcase.summary: Login to the website using old email

step.actions: in 'user name or email' field, enter the old email

testcase.name: Login when deleting the account by Facebook (29 days)
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website wykop.pl via FB, 29 days after starting the account deletion procedure
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has an account lnked with FB
  3. user started deletion account
  4. user log in 29 day after started delete account

step.actions: in the 'email or phone number' dield, enter the correct FB data
in the 'password' field, enter the FB password

step.expectedresults: logging in to wykop.pl, opening the home page, the account deletion procedure aborted

testcase.name: Login when deleting the account (29 days)
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website wykop.pl, 29 days after starting the account deletion procedure
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user started deletion account
  3. user log in 29 day after started delete account

step.actions: in the 'user name or email' field, enter the correct data

step.expectedresults: logging in to wykop.pl, opening the home page, the account deletion procedure aborted

testcase.name: Login when deleted the account (31 days)
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website wykop.pl after finifhing delete account, on the 31st day.
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user started deletion account
  3. user log in 31 day after started delete account

step.actions: in the 'user name or email' field, enter the correct wykop data

step.expectedresults: message 'invalid user name or password', not login

testcase.name: Login when deleting the account by Facebook (30 days)

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko" (empty link)

step.actions: Leaving an empty link field and clicking "Add a "znalezisko" on the web"
step.expectedresults: An empty field message, the "znalezisko" is not added

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko" (picture from web)
testcase.summary: Verify add "znalezisko", add with the picture from web

step.actions: in the 'link' field, enter the correct link
Entering the address in the graphics and click "Add"
in the 'title' and 'description' field, enter the correct characters

in the 'title' and 'description' field, enter the characters

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko"

step.actions: in the 'link' field, enter the correct link
in the 'title' and 'description' field, enter the characters

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko" (empty form field)
testcase.summary: Verify add "znalezisko" with empty field

step.actions: in the 'link' field, enter the correct link
Leaving empty fields: title, description, no tag and click "Add "znalezisko"

step.expectedresults: message: "Please give the title", "Please give a description", "You must give at least one tag", not added, return to the form

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko" long title (81) and description (301)
testcase.summary: Verify add "znalezisko" with long title (81 characters) nad long description (301 characters)

step.actions: in the 'link' field, enter the correct link

in the 'title' field, enter the 81 characters,

in the 'description' , enter the 301 characters
step.expectedresults: field filled, message about the length of the characters in red

message: "The title must have more than 6 characters and less than 80", "the description must have more than 10 characters and less than 300 characters", the "znalezisko" is not added, return to the form

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko" short title (5) iand description (9)
testcase.summary: Verify add "znalezisko" with short fitle (5 characters) nad short description (9 characters)

step.actions: in the 'link' field, enter the correct link

wypełnienie pola tytuł (5 znaków) oraz opis (9 znaków)

in the 'title' field, enter the 5 characters

in the 'description' field, enter the 9 characters
step.expectedresults: field filled, message about the length of the characters in red

message: "The title must have more than 6 characters and less than 80", "the description must have more than 10 characters and less than 300 characters", the "znalezisko" is not added, return to the form

testcase.name: Add "znalezisko" a large number of tags (7)
testcase.summary: Verify add 'znalezisko' with 7 tags

step.actions: in the 'link' field, enter the correct link
in the 'title' and 'desctiption' field, enter correct title and description

step.expectedresults: message: "You can give a maximum of 6 tags"

testcase.name: Edit added "znalezisko" (title, description, tag)
testcase.summary: Verify ability to edit the added "znalezisko"
testcase.preconditions:
1. logged user
  2. user is the author
  3. no more than 14 minutes 59 seconds passed since the "znalezisko" was added

step.actions: click - Hamburger type menu -> title and description
in the 'title, 'descryption', '#tag' filed, enter the different characters

testcase.name: Edit added "znalezisko" (empty field)
testcase.summary: Verify ability to edit the added "znalezisko" with empty field
testcase.preconditions:
1. logged user
  2. user is the author
  3. no more than 15 minutes passed since the "znalezisko" was added

step.actions: click - Hamburger type menu -> title and description

step.expectedresults: message: " "Title must be more than 6 characters and less than 80", "Description must be more than 10 characters and less than 300 characters", "at least one tag", edit form open

testcase.name: Edit added "znalezisko" (a lot of characters)
testcase.summary: Verify ability to edit the added "znalezisko" with a lot of characters.
testcase.preconditions:
1. logged user
  2. user is the author
  3. no more than 15 minutes passed since the "znalezisko" was added

step.actions: click - Hamburger type menu -> title and description
in the 'title', 'desctiption', '#tag' field, enter the title with 81 characters, description with 301 characters, tag with 7 words

step.expectedresults: message: " "Title must be more than 6 characters and less than 80", "Description must be more than 10 characters and less than 300 characters", "at least one tag", edit form open

testcase.name: Edit added "znalezisko" (too few characters)
testcase.summary: Verify ability to edit the added "znalezisko" with too few characters
testcase.preconditions:
1. logged user
  2. user is the author
  3. no more than 15 minutes passed since the "znalezisko" was added

step.actions: click - Hamburger type menu -> title and description

wypełnienie pola tytuł (5 znaków), opis (9 znaków), tag (1)

in the 'title', 'description', 'tag' fields, enter the title witch 5 characters, description with 9 characters, tag with one word

step.expectedresults: message: " "Title must be more than 6 characters and less than 80", "Description must be more than 10 characters and less than 300 characters", edit form open
